Package com.group_8.universal_gift_registry

package com.group_8.universal_gift_registry
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.group_8.universal_gift_registry.model
     
    com.group_8.universal_gift_registry.util
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    EditListController
    JFX Controller class for the Edit List scene Contains a WebView element that allows the user to browse the web, much like you can using Chrome or Firefox, to select items to add to their list, or remove items from the list.
    LandingPageController
    JFX Controller class for the Landing Page scene Enables the user to view their current lists, select one to edit, or create a new list.
    LoginController
    JFX Controller class for the Login/Register scene Enables the user to register, login, and retrieve password, while creating the persistent user entity to track which user is logged into the system.
    NewListController
    JFX Controller class for the New List scene Enables the user to choose an occasion and name for the list, then creates the new list entity and publishes the information to the database.
    PurchasesController
    JFX Controller class for the Purchases scene Enables the user to navigate through the Amazon.com web store, or even select an item off of the list and directly navigate to it, then purchase it and mark it as purchased on the list.
    SearchedListsController
    JFX Controller class for the Searched Lists scene After the user has selected another user to purchase items for, this controller allows the user to choose one of the selected user's lists to purchase off of.
    UniversalGiftRegistryApplication
    Universal Gift Registry Application Main Driver Class Overrides JFX library's start method to load the login/register scene, and then launch it.
